name: scopedWith
signature: <A, E, R>(f: (scope: Scope) => Effect<A, E, R>) => Effect<A, E, R>
description:
Creates a `Scope`, passes it to the specified effectful function, and closes
the scope when the effect completes (whether through success, failure, or
interruption).
documentation:
